00044 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00045 
00046 #include "mdt_internal.h"
00047 
00048 struct lu_buf *mdt_buf(const struct lu_env *env, void *area, ssize_t len)
00049 {
00050         struct lu_buf *buf;
00051         struct mdt_thread_info *mti;
00052 
00053         mti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00054         buf = &mti->mti_buf;
00055         buf->lb_buf = area;
00056         buf->lb_len = len;
00057         return buf;
00058 }
00059 
00060 const struct lu_buf *mdt_buf_const(const struct lu_env *env,
00061                                    const void *area, ssize_t len)
00062 {
00063         struct lu_buf *buf;
00064         struct mdt_thread_info *mti;
00065 
00066         mti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00067         buf = &mti->mti_buf;
00068 
00069         buf->lb_buf = (void *)area;
00070         buf->lb_len = len;
00071         return buf;
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*
00075  * last_rcvd & last_committed update callbacks
00076  */
00077 extern struct lu_context_key mdt_thread_key;
00078 
00079 /* This callback notifies MDT that transaction was done. This is needed by
00080  * mdt_save_lock() only. It is similar to new target code and will be removed
00081  * as mdt_save_lock() will be converted to use target structures */
00082 static int mdt_txn_stop_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00083                            struct thandle *txn, void *cookie)
00084 {
00085         struct mdt_thread_info  *mti;
00086 
00087         mti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00088         LASSERT(mti);
00089 
00090         if (mti->mti_has_trans)
00091                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "More than one transaction\n");
00092         else
00093                 mti->mti_has_trans = 1;
00094         return 0;
00095 }
00096 
00097 int mdt_fs_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt,
00098                  struct obd_device *obd, struct lustre_sb_info *lsi)
00099 {
00100         int rc = 0;
00101 
00102         ENTRY;
00103 
00104         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_FS_SETUP))
00105                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00106 
00107         /* prepare transactions callbacks */
00108         mdt->mdt_txn_cb.dtc_txn_start = NULL;
00109         mdt->mdt_txn_cb.dtc_txn_stop = mdt_txn_stop_cb;
00110         mdt->mdt_txn_cb.dtc_txn_commit = NULL;
00111         mdt->mdt_txn_cb.dtc_cookie = NULL;
00112         mdt->mdt_txn_cb.dtc_tag = LCT_MD_THREAD;
00113         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mdt->mdt_txn_cb.dtc_linkage);
00114 
00115         dt_txn_callback_add(mdt->mdt_bottom, &mdt->mdt_txn_cb);
00116 
00117         RETURN(rc);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void mdt_fs_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt)
00121 {
00122         ENTRY;
00123 
00124         /* Remove transaction callback */
00125         dt_txn_callback_del(mdt->mdt_bottom, &mdt->mdt_txn_cb);
00126         EXIT;
00127 }
00128 
00129 /* reconstruction code */
00130 static void mdt_steal_ack_locks(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00131 {
00132         struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt;
00133         struct obd_export          *exp = req->rq_export;
00134         struct list_head           *tmp;
00135         struct ptlrpc_reply_state  *oldrep;
00136         int                         i;
00137 
00138         /* CAVEAT EMPTOR: spinlock order */
00139         spin_lock(&exp->exp_lock);
00140         list_for_each(tmp, &exp->exp_outstanding_replies) {
00141                 oldrep = list_entry(tmp, struct ptlrpc_reply_state,
00142                                     rs_exp_list);
00143 
00144                 if (oldrep->rs_xid != req->rq_xid)
00145                         continue;
00146 
00147                 if (oldrep->rs_opc != lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg))
00148                         CERROR ("Resent req xid "LPU64" has mismatched opc: "
00149                                 "new %d old %d\n", req->rq_xid,
00150                                 lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg),
00151                                 oldrep->rs_opc);
00152 
00153                 svcpt = oldrep->rs_svcpt;
00154                 spin_lock(&svcpt->scp_rep_lock);
00155 
00156                 list_del_init(&oldrep->rs_exp_list);
00157 
00158                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "Stealing %d locks from rs %p x"LPD64".t"LPD64
00159                        " o%d NID %s\n",
00160                        oldrep->rs_nlocks, oldrep,
00161                        oldrep->rs_xid, oldrep->rs_transno, oldrep->rs_opc,
00162                        libcfs_nid2str(exp->exp_connection->c_peer.nid));
00163 
00164                 for (i = 0; i < oldrep->rs_nlocks; i++)
00165                         ptlrpc_save_lock(req, &oldrep->rs_locks[i],
00166                                          oldrep->rs_modes[i], 0);
00167                 oldrep->rs_nlocks = 0;
00168 
00169                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req, "stole locks for");
00170                 spin_lock(&oldrep->rs_lock);
00171                 ptlrpc_schedule_difficult_reply(oldrep);
00172                 spin_unlock(&oldrep->rs_lock);
00173 
00174                 spin_unlock(&svcpt->scp_rep_lock);
00175                 break;
00176         }
00177         spin_unlock(&exp->exp_lock);
00178 }
00179 
00180 __u64 mdt_req_from_lrd(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00181                        struct tg_reply_data *trd)
00182 {
00183         struct lsd_reply_data *lrd;
00184 
00185         LASSERT(trd != NULL);
00186         lrd = &trd->trd_reply;
00187 
00188         DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req, "restoring transno "LPD64"/status %d",
00189                   lrd->lrd_transno, lrd->lrd_result);
00190 
00191         req->rq_transno = lrd->lrd_transno;
00192         req->rq_status = lrd->lrd_result;
00193 
00194         lustre_msg_set_versions(req->rq_repmsg, trd->trd_pre_versions);
00195 
00196         if (req->rq_status != 0)
00197                 req->rq_transno = 0;
00198         lustre_msg_set_transno(req->rq_repmsg, req->rq_transno);
00199         lustre_msg_set_status(req->rq_repmsg, req->rq_status);
00200 
00201         DEBUG_REQ(D_RPCTRACE, req, "restoring transno "LPD64"/status %d",
00202                   req->rq_transno, req->rq_status);
00203 
00204         mdt_steal_ack_locks(req);
00205 
00206         return lrd->lrd_data;
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 void mdt_reconstruct_generic(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00211                              struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00212 {
00213         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(mti);
00214 
00215         mdt_req_from_lrd(req, mti->mti_reply_data);
00216         return;
00217 }
00218 
00231 static void mdt_fake_ma(struct md_attr *ma)
00232 {
00233         ma->ma_valid = MA_INODE;
00234         memset(&ma->ma_attr, 0, sizeof(ma->ma_attr));
00235         ma->ma_attr.la_valid = LA_NLINK;
00236         ma->ma_attr.la_mode = S_IFREG;
00237 }
00238 
00239 static void mdt_reconstruct_create(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00240                                    struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00241 {
00242         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(mti);
00243         struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
00244         struct mdt_device *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00245         struct mdt_object *child;
00246         struct mdt_body *body;
00247         int rc;
00248 
00249         mdt_req_from_lrd(req, mti->mti_reply_data);
00250         if (req->rq_status)
00251                 return;
00252 
00253         /* if no error, so child was created with requested fid */
00254         child = mdt_object_find(mti->mti_env, mdt, mti->mti_rr.rr_fid2);
00255         if (IS_ERR(child)) {
00256                 rc = PTR_ERR(child);
00257                 LCONSOLE_WARN("cannot lookup child "DFID": rc = %d; "
00258                               "evicting client %s with export %s\n",
00259                               PFID(mti->mti_rr.rr_fid2), rc,
00260                               obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid),
00261                               obd_export_nid2str(exp));
00262                 mdt_export_evict(exp);
00263                 RETURN_EXIT;
00264         }
00265 
00266         body = req_capsule_server_get(mti->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00267         mti->mti_attr.ma_need = MA_INODE;
00268         mti->mti_attr.ma_valid = 0;
00269         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(mti, child, &mti->mti_attr);
00270         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00271                 mdt_fake_ma(&mti->mti_attr);
00272         } else if (rc == -EREMOTE) {
00273                 /* object was created on remote server */
00274                 if (!mdt_is_dne_client(exp))
00275                         /* Return -EIO for old client */
00276                         rc = -EIO;
00277 
00278                 req->rq_status = rc;
00279                 body->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_MDS;
00280         }
00281         mdt_pack_attr2body(mti, body, &mti->mti_attr.ma_attr,
00282                            mdt_object_fid(child));
00283         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, child);
00284 }
00285 
00286 static void mdt_reconstruct_setattr(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00287                                     struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00288 {
00289         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(mti);
00290         struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
00291         struct mdt_device *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00292         struct mdt_object *obj;
00293         struct mdt_body *body;
00294         int rc;
00295 
00296         mdt_req_from_lrd(req, mti->mti_reply_data);
00297         if (req->rq_status)
00298                 return;
00299 
00300         body = req_capsule_server_get(mti->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00301         obj = mdt_object_find(mti->mti_env, mdt, mti->mti_rr.rr_fid1);
00302         if (IS_ERR(obj)) {
00303                 rc = PTR_ERR(obj);
00304                 LCONSOLE_WARN("cannot lookup "DFID": rc = %d; "
00305                               "evicting client %s with export %s\n",
00306                               PFID(mti->mti_rr.rr_fid1), rc,
00307                               obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid),
00308                               obd_export_nid2str(exp));
00309                 mdt_export_evict(exp);
00310                 RETURN_EXIT;
00311         }
00312 
00313         mti->mti_attr.ma_need = MA_INODE;
00314         mti->mti_attr.ma_valid = 0;
00315 
00316         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(mti, obj, &mti->mti_attr);
00317         if (rc == -ENOENT)
00318                 mdt_fake_ma(&mti->mti_attr);
00319         mdt_pack_attr2body(mti, body, &mti->mti_attr.ma_attr,
00320                            mdt_object_fid(obj));
00321 
00322         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
00323 }
00324 
00325 typedef void (*mdt_reconstructor)(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00326                                   struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc);
00327 
00328 static mdt_reconstructor reconstructors[REINT_MAX] = {
00329         [REINT_SETATTR]  = mdt_reconstruct_setattr,
00330         [REINT_CREATE]   = mdt_reconstruct_create,
00331         [REINT_LINK]     = mdt_reconstruct_generic,
00332         [REINT_UNLINK]   = mdt_reconstruct_generic,
00333         [REINT_RENAME]   = mdt_reconstruct_generic,
00334         [REINT_OPEN]     = mdt_reconstruct_open,
00335         [REINT_SETXATTR] = mdt_reconstruct_generic
00336 };
00337 
00338 void mdt_reconstruct(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00339                      struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00340 {
00341         ENTRY;
00342         reconstructors[mti->mti_rr.rr_opcode](mti, lhc);
00343         EXIT;
00344 }
